description: Listed building consent in connection with infilling existing ground floor opening on south west elevation with a lightweight timber/plasterboard stud partition in addition to (planning application reference: P112478) minor material amendments to implemented planning permission P010342 (dated 10.09.2003) for the 'erection of basement and seven storey building (gross floorspace 7296 sq.m.) containing A1 ground floor retail units on Great Sutton Street with return frontage to Goswell Road, an A3 basement and ground floor restaurant on Clerkenwell Road and a C1 hotel with basement  fitness centre in the remainder of the new building.  Use of upper floors of 'Hat and Feathers' public house as additional hotel accommodation and linking of them to the new hotel' (Also full  planning application reference: P112478 submitted) This application may affect the setting of a listed building.  Town and Country Planning (Listed Building and Conservation Areas) Act 1990 (as amended); Section 67.
decision_conditions:
CONDITION: The development hereby permitted shall be begun not later than the expiration of two years from the date of this permission.

REASON: To comply with the provisions of Section 91(1)(a) of the Town and Country Planning Act 1990 as amended by the Planning and Compulsory Purchase Act 2004 (Chapter 5).
